SELECT B.ITM_CD AS ITM_CD, B.COL_CD AS COL_CD, SUM(B.PLD_FQTY) AS PLD_FQTY, ISNULL((SELECT ITM.ITM_NM FROM TT_ITMMST ITM WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ITM.ITM_CD = B.ITM_CD AND ITM.COL_CD = B.COL_CD), '') AS ITM_NM, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TO_MCITM TM WITH (NOLOCK), TO_ORDDET OD WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TM.ORM_NO = A.ORM_NO AND TM.ORM_NO = OD.ORM_NO AND TM.ORD_ISEQ = OD.ORD_ISEQ AND TM.ORD_SSEQ = OD.ORD_SSEQ ) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END ) AS 'MICHUL_YN', ISNULL((SELECT SUM(WT.WTP_PLANQTY) FROM TW_WTRECPL WT WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE WT.ORM_NO = A.ORM_NO AND WT.ITM_CD = B.ITM_CD AND WT.COL_CD = B.COL_CD), 0) AS RETURN_QTY, B.ITM_CD + '-' + B.COL_CD AS 'ITEM_COL', ( CASE WHEN B.BMT_SGRADE = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS DELAY_YN FROM TC_PLANMST A WITH (NOLOCK), TC_PLANDTL B WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.COM_SCD = #{com_scd} AND A.STI_CD = #{sti_cd} AND A.PLM_CDT = #{date} AND A.PLM_NO = B.PLM_NO AND B.COM_PLDSEC IN ('C092', 'C090') AND B.PLD_FQTY <> 0 AND (B.ITM_CD NOT LIKE 'EXTRA%' AND B.ITM_CD NOT LIKE 'ZERO%') AND (B.ITM_CD NOT IN ('HW00E15EE', 'HW00E24EE', 'HW00E25EE', 'HW01E15EE', 'HW01E24EE', 'HW01E25EE', 'C37', 'X1', 'AS-1A-000')) GROUP BY B.ITM_CD, B.COL_CD, A.ORM_NO, B.BMT_SGRADE
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BMT_ITEM AS ITM_CD, B.COL_CD AS COL_CD, SUM(B.PLD_FQTY) AS PLD_FQTY, ISNULL((SELECT BTM.BMT_NM FROM TT_BOMMST BTM WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE BTM.BMT_ITEM = B.BMT_ITEM AND BTM.COL_CD = B.COL_CD ), '') AS ITM_NM, '' AS 'MICHUL_YN', 0 AS RETURN_QTY, B.BMT_ITEM + '-' + B.COL_CD AS ITEM_COL, 'N' AS DELAY_YN FROM TA_PLANMST A WITH (NOLOCK), TA_PLANDTL B WITH (NOLOCK), TA_RPTREQ C WITH (NOLOCK), TT_BOMMST D WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.COM_SCD = #{com_scd} AND A.STI_CD = #{sti_cd} AND A.PLM_CDT = #{date} AND A.PLM_NO = B.PLM_NO AND B.PLD_FQTY <> 0 AND A.RPT_NO = C.RPT_NO AND A.RPT_SEQ = C.RPT_SEQ AND A.PLM_CDT = C.RPT_ENDDT AND C.STI_CD = A.STI_CD AND B.BMT_ITEM = D.BMT_ITEM AND B.COL_CD = D.COL_CD AND RIGHT(D.BMT_NM, 5) NOT LIKE '(미상차)%' GROUP BY B.BMT_ITEM , B.COL_CD

SELECT DISTINCT CASE ( SELECT TCR.REM_CSEC FROM TC_RESMST TCR WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCR.PLM_NO = A.PLM_NO AND TCR.COM_SSEC = 'C18C' ) WHEN 'R' THEN '[재일정]'+A.ORM_NM ELSE A.ORM_NM END AS ORM_NM, A.ORM_GADDR AS ORM_GADDR, ( SELECT TTC.CCD_NM FROM TT_COMCD TTC WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TTC.CCD_CD = A.PLM_FTM ) AS PLM_FTMNM, ( CASE ( SELECT TCR.LOADING_YN FROM TC_RESMST TCR WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCR.PLM_NO = A.PLM_NO AND TCR.COM_SSEC = 'C18C' ) WHEN 'Y' THEN '상차완료' ELSE '상차전' END ) AS LOADING_YN, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TC_LOADINGISSUE TCL WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCL.REM_DT = ( SELECT TCR.REM_DT FROM TC_RESMST TCR WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCR.PLM_NO = A.PLM_NO AND TCR.COM_SSEC = 'C18C' ) AND TCL.REM_SEQ = ( SELECT TCR.REM_SEQ FROM TC_RESMST TCR WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCR.PLM_NO = A.PLM_NO AND TCR.COM_SSEC = 'C18C' ) AND TCL.COM_SSEC = 'C18C' ) > 0 THEN '상차이슈발생' ELSE '' END ) AS LOADINGISSUE_YN FROM TC_PLANMST A WITH (NOLOCK), TC_PLANDTL TCP WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.COM_SCD = #{com_scd} AND A.STI_CD = #{sti_cd} AND A.PLM_CDT = #{date} AND A.PLM_NO = TCP.PLM_NO AND TCP.ITM_CD + '-' + TCP.COL_CD = #{itmcd_col} AND TCP.PLD_EQTY <> 0
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT CASE ( SELECT TCR.REM_CSEC FROM TC_RESMST TCR WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCR.PLM_NO = A.PLM_NO AND TCR.COM_SSEC = 'C18A' ) WHEN 'R' THEN '[재일정]'+A.CTM_NM ELSE A.CTM_NM END AS ORM_NM, A.CTM_ADDR AS ORM_GADDR, ( SELECT TTC.CCD_NM FROM TT_COMCD TTC WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TTC.CCD_CD = A.PLM_FTM ) AS PLM_FTMNM, ( CASE ( SELECT TCR.LOADING_YN FROM TC_RESMST TCR WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCR.PLM_NO = A.PLM_NO AND TCR.COM_SSEC = 'C18A' ) WHEN 'Y' THEN '상차완료' ELSE '상차전' END ) AS LOADING_YN, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TC_LOADINGISSUE TCL WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCL.REM_DT = ( SELECT TCR.REM_DT FROM TC_RESMST TCR WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCR.PLM_NO = A.PLM_NO AND TCR.COM_SSEC = 'C18A' ) AND TCL.REM_SEQ = ( SELECT TCR.REM_SEQ FROM TC_RESMST TCR WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE TCR.PLM_NO = A.PLM_NO AND TCR.COM_SSEC = 'C18A' ) AND TCL.COM_SSEC = 'C18C' ) > 0 THEN '상차이슈발생' ELSE '' END ) AS LOADINGISSUE_YN FROM TA_PLANMST A WITH (NOLOCK), TA_RPTREQ B WITH (NOLOCK), TA_PLANDTL TAP WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.COM_SCD = #{com_scd} AND A.STI_CD = #{sti_cd} AND A.PLM_CDT = #{date} AND A.RPT_NO = B.RPT_NO AND A.RPT_SEQ = B.RPT_SEQ AND A.PLM_CDT = B.RPT_ENDDT AND B.STI_CD = A.STI_CD AND A.PLM_NO = TAP.PLM_NO AND TAP.BMT_ITEM + '-' + TAP.COL_CD = #{itmcd_col} AND TAP.PLD_EQTY <> 0
